section.45: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Uqbah bin 'Aws, that the Mssenger of Allah said:"Indeed the accidental killing, the killing with a whip or stick, for it (the Diyah) is one hundred camels - a severe penalty - of which forty should be (she-camels) with their young in their wombs
